1.content:
Christina https://data.whicdn.com/images/289704979...
A dynamic eighteen year old. Standing at 5'6'' she is a medium height for her age. She has about chest length brown hair. She is a complicated person having two contrasting sides so it really matters what day or what mood she is in when talking to someone. Her most prominent characteristic is her leadership skills being the one to call charge in a battle or stand up for what she believes in.

Katherine
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...
Is a poetic kind soul, who can be perfectly described as ones grandma, in personality that is. Standing at 5'9'' she has lanky but fitting features that sometimes she loves, sometimes she hates. She has shoulder length brown hair that is a slightly lighter brown at the tips. She is a person to pick up a stranger when they are feeling down or left out.

Lisa
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/ori...
Is a hilarious human being to some, crazy to others. Standing at 5'5'' has short platinum blonde hair but that changes all the time. She really knows why her and others do their actions. Before she becomes someone's friend she will probably know what they will be like to her.

Amy
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/ori...
A sweetheart that will help her friends in need. Standing at 4'10'' because she has Turners syndrome. She used to be insecure about it but now embraces it as an unique quality about herself. She has long black hair about the same length as Christina's being chest length. She loves everything USA and country. She loves to talk to people and will talk to anyone if they need it even if they don't say a word back. She has lost friends in the past making her extra caring to her friends when they are here.

Lauren
https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/image...
Likes to observe more than speaking. Standing at 5'6.5'' she has naturally wavy black hair. Sometimes her quiet nature comes off as her disliking new people. She has a dry, sarcastic humor to people that she feels comfortable around. Unlike the extroverted Amy and Katherine approaching people is difficult for her leaving her in her comfortable and chill introvert shell.

Danielle
https://data.whicdn.com/images/274775039...
Goes by Dani. Is a very hyper fifteen year old but not in an annoying way. She loves making new friends but usually chases after the wrong people. She is popular because of her hyper and relatable nature. With her inside circle she is very empathetic and a good listener if someone needs to cry or has a problem. She is tall being 5'8.5'' with short dyed black hair but usually looks long because she wears extensions.
1.title: Meet The Characters

11.content:
Christina was having trouble in English, which was quite uncommon for her, and it was getting on her nerves.

She had an A- in the class ruining her 4.0 GPA she desired, she was even thinking about getting a tutor.

She looked at the back of the head of the girl in front of her, this girl was smart, or at least obsessed with writing.

Christina didn't really want to ask the girl, not remembering her name it seemed rude.

Luckily Katherine noticed her stare and spoke to her after class.

"Hello I'm Katherine." She introduced herself to Christina who smiled back.

"Did you need something?" Katherine's words would have come out rude from most people but Katherine's tone was soothing.

"Yes I need..."
11.title: Christina & Katherine

12.content:
Lisa and Amy were best friends, the only one to stay with her when everyone else left her teasing her.

Currently unknown to Amy, Lisa was in the bathroom being cornered by the bullies.

"Lisa, you're a pretty girl. Why do you hang out with a ugly loser like Amy?" Lisa gripped the sides of the sink knowing she would get in trouble for punching the bully.

That didn't help her that much though as a bony fist slammed into her gut.

At the moment Lisa was unlucky for having a flat stomach it not being hurtful to the puncher but not protecting any of her abdominal organs.

Lisa took all the punches, slaps, and kicks thrown at her until the prettiness that the bully said she had was shrouded by red and purple welts all over her body.

She collapsed on the floor her ears ringing and the laugh of the bully reverberating through her ears until someone found her.

She opened her eyes to the best of her abilities to see...
12.title: Lisa & Amy

124.content:
Dani walked into the bathroom sniffling at herself getting detention and possibly getting her girlfriend detention too when she saw something that made her forget her pain.

Lisa was propped up against the wall which she barely had pulled herself over to.

Her nose was furiously bleeding staining her nice new yellow shirt's collar.

Lisa was a little out of it only able to see the outline of Dani so when she came closer she whimpered.

"Hey, it's okay, I won't hurt you." Dani's raspy voice contradicted her words especially when she spoke in a whisper.

Lisa couldn't really do anything to stop her though and let the tall girl crouch next to her.

"Probably need to stop that bleeding first." Dani grabbed a paper towel from the dispenser it being scratchy and nothing compared to a real tissue.

Lisa flinched at every touch it hurting throughout her entire body and she just wanted Amy.

She wanted to cry with Amy hugging her and saying nice things about her but she was stuck with this tall Sophomore.

The door opens again leaving Lisa grumbling to reveal
124.title: Dani

1241.content:
"Hey Lisa, it's okay." Amy crouched down next to Lisa.

Lisa smiled looking at the short girl.

"Hey Ames." Lisa slurred out her words as her fat lip caused prevention of correct pronunciation.

"Did you do this?" Amy looked nonthreatening next to the five eight sophomore but she was mad and Dani was taken aback.

Dani's eyes were still slightly bloodshot from crying and Amy soon realized that.

"No, I promise. I was just coming to the bathroom and saw her against the wall bleeding." Dani begged not wanting to get into more trouble.

Dani was starting to breathe heavier a panic attack bound to happen with all the stress thrown at her.

And just her luck someone else came in.
1241.title: Amy

13.content:
https://i.pinimg.com/236x/89/72/01/89720...
Lauren and Dani were the most puzzling couple of the Sophomore class for numerous reasons.

They were exact opposites meaning they do complete each other but they were the exact opposite of each other's type.

When asked, the couple always answered that opposites attract.

"I should just shut them up by saying I paid you to be my girlfriend." Lauren looked into the light green eyes that always trapped her.

Dani's eyes lit up laughing at Lauren's comment, "Other way around Sugar."

Lauren's lightly tanned cheeks turned rosy red a sucker for the raspy voice, especially when complimenting her.

Lauren grabbed Dani's hand, both of their fingers being crooked uniquely but fit each other perfectly.

Dani felt a bolt of electricity rush through her veins at the contact Lauren's soft fingers unlike Dani's own rough ones from playing the guitar.

Lauren loved Dani playing the guitar though so didn't mind,

"Are you not accepting my compliment Spice?" Lauren asked teasingly because Dani loved affirmation.

Being that they are opposites they are Sugar and Spice.

Dani the sassy, spicy one.

Lauren being the good, sweet one.
13.title: Lauren & Dani

131.content:
Dani twiddled her thumbs in class feeling tense as she ignored the lesson thinking about one person, Lauren.

She wasn't tense because of Lauren, Lauren was the one thing that calmed her down, one of the secret reasons that she loved Lauren.

It wasn't secret to Lauren who had witnessed numerous of Dani's anxiety attacks but to the rest of the school.

"Miss Knox. Phone. Up here, now!" The math teacher yells only adding to my stress as I shakily get up probably paler than my normal white color.

The fact that I did send a text through to Lauren now has me nervous about her.

Lauren's phone beeped quite loudly during the test they were taking making her jump and everyone look at her.

She simply knew what was going to happen and brought her phone and unfinished test up to the teacher but first turned her phone off and cleared the notification.

"Good choice but you still have detention with Miss Patterson after school." I sigh knowing that there will be no way out of this and decide to take a short nap.
131.title: In class

1311.content:
Lauren walks into detention head down in shame as she sees Dani there too. Most people would give a glare, or be mad at the person that gave them detention but Lauren shoots her a reassuring smile seeing the slight puffiness of her eyes.

Dani feels a little better seeing Lauren's face but a pit of guilt still lies in her stomach.

Dani mouths "I'm sorry." To Lauren as she walks by with her required homework in hand.

This time Lauren ignores her not because she feels like being rude but because she is lost in her own world.

What could she be thinking about?
1311.title: Detention

13113.content:
Lauren was indeed thinking about the very girl she was ignoring.

It wasn't her fault that she was very in love with her, Dani was gorgeous inside and out.

She was trying to figure out what to do for their next date, which

"Lauren? Where's your homework?" Miss Patterson asks each word wanting to coat Lauren with shame.

Miss Patterson and Lauren weren't on very good terms in her class because Lauren never participated.

It was because every time Lauren had to give some sort of long speech which meant more than a paragraph of words she would start to stutter.

And Miss Patterson happened to be the speech teacher.

"I'm starting to think you are mute Miss. Hunt, or did you just never learn how to speak." Lauren opened her mouth but no words came out came out causing her to put her head in her hands.

Dani looks at her defeated girlfriend thinking should I stand up for her or not?
13113.title: Daydreamers Fall Hard

131131.content:
"Isn't your job to watch over us not bully us?" Dani sat on the desk in front of Lauren the only physical way to get in the way.

Dani put one hand behind her back for Lauren to grab the teacher starting to scare her.

"My job is to enforce the rules of detention and I'll see you here tomorrow Danielle." Dani having a long torso still was at eye level with Miss. Patterson.

"And you too Miss. Hunt. Bring a better work ethic." Dani's pale face turned to one of fear and shame. She got her girlfriend detention again, and herself but that wasn't important.
131131.title: Yes

131132.content:
It took all of Dani's power to not yell at the teacher seeing her defeated girlfriend being stared at like a circus animal.

As people started going back to their own conversations Lauren never changed positions feeling paralyzed.

She was overwhelmed with being put on the spot then embarrassing herself.

Miss Patterson finally dismissed the room starting to feel bad having watched Lauren for most of the time.

"Lauren come on. We have to go." Dani tried to get Lauren to even move besides breathing.

"What is wrong with her?" Miss Patterson asked concerned after ten minutes of failure out of Dani.

"Her coping mechanism isn't healthy." Dani pointed out knowing this was Lauren's.

Lauren wanted the world to disappear. She wanted to open her eyes and be by herself where she could get angry but no she was the sweet girl.
131132.title: No

1312.content:
Dani was picking at her food as she was dreading seeing Lauren.

She was not dreading to see Lauren, more her reaction to detention.

Lauren sat next to Dani giving her sulking body a kiss on the cheek, "Hi Spice."

Dani smiled up at Lauren, happy for her not changing her attitude towards her.

"You okay?" Lauren asked grabbing Dani's hand knowing that she texted because of some anxiety.

Dani shrugged feeling overwhelmed in general.

Lauren pulled Dani into a hug setting her lips on her temple.

Dani smiled at Lauren's touch it sending a calm warmth through her body.

"A little better?" Lauren asked and Dani nodded.

"Are you mad?" Dani wondered timidly not wanting Lauren to explode on her.

Lauren gave her a soft smile, "Of course not Spice, you are the most important thing in my life. I would have been mad if you didn't tell me."

"Bu-" Lauren cut Dani off with a kiss.

"I get to spend more time with you"
1312.title: Lunch

13121.content:
Detention was pretty laid back because as long as you didn't leave you weren't reprimanded.

The teachers didn't care because it was as horrible for them as the children, unless the teacher was the one to give you detention you away with anything.

"Sugar." Dani leaned over Lauren kissing the girl's forehead.

"Hey Spice." Lauren smiled at the girl's soft lips. "How are you?"

"Better now that I'm with you." Lauren rolls her eyes at her girlfriend's cheesiness.

"What? It is true." Dani defended and Lauren kissed Dani again.
13121.title: Detention Goes Well

13122.content:
Dani trudged to detention looking down at the ground her normally pale face even more void of color.

"It's the lovebirds. Skipped class for your own pleasure?" The class snickers as Lauren stares at her desk her face red out of total embarrassment.

Dani was shell shocked as she was still standing in the doorway.

She felt tears come up in her throat but held them back.

Lauren's body language didn't help ease her fears.

The teasing kept coming as the selectively deaf teacher doesn't seem to care.
13122.title: Detention Fails

132.content:
Lauren and Dani sadly had to part their ways after school because of one major thing they shared, their parents.

Both their parents were strict and both expected their two Catholic daughters to fall in love with a man and marry him.

One day Lauren was close to telling her mom, probably the more forgiving out of the two, but then she made a comment that scarred Lauren forever.

Lauren was practicing for her drivers test downtown when there was a lesbian couple walking hand in hand down the street.

"Those sinning dykes are going to Hell." Lauren choked on her own spit hearing those words come out of her mom's mouth.

Lauren never argued or agreed with her and ever since that incident when her mom commented something bad about being gay Lauren tensed up scared that she had somehow figured out her secret.

"Hey sweetheart. How are you?" Lauren was snapped out of her flashback by her smiling mom at the door.

She faked a smile and it was not as convincing as her normal 'I'm okay' smiles.

"Sweetie what's wrong." Lauren felt a hand wrap around her wrist knowing she was in for a long talk about how she is so great and in time a boyfriend will come.

That two syllable word made her shudder, boyfriend.

Dani though had it worse because she was the daughter of a very traditional pastor.

In short, break one of the Ten Commandments she got grounded for a week.

"How are you Dan? Talk to that boy of yours?" Dani sighed actually having lied about having a boyfriend, breaking one of those rules.

Her parents kept setting her up with church boys, which are great kids, but clearly not her type.

"Yeah." She tried to feign enthusiasm, it working against her parents because they wanted to believe it.

"We need to meet this boy." Her father says and her throat dries up. "Can he come over for dinner Friday night?" Dani doesn't answer her tongue caught in her throat.

What is she going to do?
132.title: At home

1321.content:
"Yeah I'll see if they're free." Dani finally manages as her parents eyes narrow at her.

Lauren's phone rang and she went to grab it but her mom put a hand over it.

Lauren reactionary responded, "That might be my.." Lauren covered her mouth realizing where that was going.

Her mom picked up on it though, "Who is this person I'm not supposed to know about?" Her mom started to turn her phone over and Lauren snatched it.

The picture of Dani calling being the taller girl kissing her rosy cheek.

Dani sighed as Lauren didn't pick her phone up.

Luckily Lauren's name popped on her phone though, "Hi..." She sees the glares of her parents.

"Dan, you okay?" Dani's heart sunk at the way Lauren said Dan meaning one thing, one of her parents is listening.

"Can I speak to you in private?" Dani was more asking her parents but Lauren got the message.

Dani went into the guest room while Lauren went to her room, "Yes Spice?" Lauren asked signaling she was alone.

"My parents want to meet my boyfriend and I'm kind of tired of lying." Dani really hoped Lauren would come.

Lauren looked at the ceiling praying to God that she wouldn't be killed, "Anything for my Spice, what time?"

Dani pumped a fist in the air, "Friday at six."
1321.title: Tell the truth

13211.content:
I'm going to die, I'm going to die, I'm going to die, Lauren thought over and over to herself unable to find the strength to knock on the door.

She finally did it met with a tall, balding man, presumably Mr. Knox.

Soon an older women comes by his side which she would have to guess was Dani's mother then sharing skin tone and eye color.

"Who are you?" Lauren looked at the bouquet of flowers in her hand trying to muster up some courage her her normally coward personality.

"Your g-guest sir." Lauren internally cursed herself for stuttering.

"I highly doubt that, you're a girl, not a boy." Lauren didn't answer and just looked down at the ground again.

"Hey Laur." Lauren looked up happy to be able to hand the flowers to someone. "Thank you!" Dani gratefully took them.

"Danielle. Who is this? I thought your boyfriend was coming." Dani and Lauren both cringed at the word.

"This is my girlfriend, Lauren." Mr. Knox's face turned red as he turned his blazing gaze at Lauren.

"Get. Out. Now." Lauren...
13211.title: Dinner

132111.content:
"Do you not speak English? Leave!" Lauren walked like a hit dog out of the house. Dani's parents yelled at her but she didn't care remembering the look on Lauren's face. She looked as though she was going to burst into tears and Dani was right, that's exactly what Lauren did when she got far enough away from the house that hated her.

Dani went to school surprised when she couldn't find Lauren.

Dani found Lauren sitting in class though, "Leave me alone." Lauren muttered hurt and ashamed.

"I don't care what my parents say, it's all just words." Dani started to lift Lauren's face up and saw a swollen, black and blue face.

"What happened to you?" Dani asked Lauren noting her beat up appearance.
132111.title: Left

1321111.content:
Lauren turned her head down but Dani noticed the tears sprinkled on her face.

"Sugar, don't ignore me please." Dani slightly begged as Lauren gave her the cold shoulder.

"I just want to know what happened, and help you." Dani put the pressure on her, her voice slightly cracking.

Dani didn't do well with being ignored, it wasn't like she got mad or an egotistical thing, she felt unwanted, unnecessary.

Lauren was the person that always wanted her so this was a breaking point.

"Dan, don't cry." Lauren whispered not liking the tears now streaming down her girlfriend's face.

Her crooked fingers wiped some of the tears off of them getting a reactionary smile out of Dani.

"I don't like seeing you hurt." Dani admitted studying Lauren's swollen face.

Lauren was still pretty, at least in Dani's view, her brown eyes still sparkling Lauren was looking at Dani's green eyes.

"So what happened so I can go beat them up." Lauren laughed her chest hurting at the action.

She gripped it slightly as Dani looked at her concerned, "Some people aren't as diplomatic as your parents."

It clicked in Dani's mind, Lauren's parents hurt her.

Lauren knew it was going to happen, she wasn't shocked at the hot tempered adults she lived with.

"Dan, they won't do it again, they were just a little hot headed." Dani couldn't believe Lauren as all the cogs clicked in Dani's brain.

She knew what she had to do.
1321111.title: Parents

13211112.content:
"A little hot headed means messing up my girlfriend's beautiful face." Dani sarcastically shot back sitting on Lauren's desk.

Lauren hung her head embarrassed at her appearance.

Dani tilted Lauren's head up, "But it is still gorgeous." This made Lauren smile.

"Want to get out of here?" Lauren gave Dani a knowing look.

"Dani they didn't like the fact that have a girlfriend. I don't think they'll like the fact that I'm skipping with you." Dani frowned tucking a strand of hair behind Lauren's ear.

"Fine, but only for my Sugar's safety." Dani kissed Lauren's nose making sure to be careful around the tender skin before sitting down herself.
13211112.title: Comfort Lauren

132111121.content:
"Hey baby." Dani kissed Lauren's bruised cheek as she walked up next to her.

A smile formed on Lauren's face because Lauren loved being called Dani's baby, not babe, baby.

"Ready to go home?" Dani asked ready to have a peaceful thirty minutes with Lauren.

"That depends, are you walking with me?" Lauren asked not knowing if Dani's parents would still allow it.

Lauren's parents both worked and couldn't do anything about it.

"Of course Sugar." Lauren turned around and Dani captured her with a kiss on her nose.

Lauren's face turned red at the surprise contact.

"There is no one I would want to hang out with more." Dani wrapped her left arm around Lauren as she kissed the side of her head.
132111121.title: Go Home Together

choices: Mr. Knox is going to change that
132112.content:
Lauren was too scared to move and she really didn't want to.

She thought leaving would mean breaking up with Dani.

"Are you stupid, get out!" Lauren now understood where Dani got her loudness from.

"Dad! Stop it!" Dani whined getting a glare in return.

"No this girl turned you into a sinner, I will not stop." Dani stepped in between the two, not like Lauren was going to do anything but Dani's dad looked mad.

"I asked her out dad, it wasn't her fault." Mr. Knox was so disappointed in his daughter but knew better than to reactionary hurt her.

"What did I do wrong?" Her asked Dani who was expecting more of an eruption.

He wasn't even close to accepting Dani being gay, must less actually having a girlfriend.

"Dad you did nothing wrong. I love Lauren and she loves me."
132112.title: Stayed

She is a complicated person having two contrasting sides so it really matters what day or what mood she is in when talking to someone.
